name: Scratch 2.0 Swaggification
description: Scratch 2.0 according to MegaApuTurkUltra and Shinkansen/jTron
additional_info:
I based this style off of @shinkansen and @jTron's style, but fixed up some bugs and made a lot of my own improvements.

Don't like the blurry homepage images? Install my userscript to fix them! https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/8101-scratch-swaggification-homepage-fixer

Updates: 3/25
Added rules for HTTPS, now that Scratch has officially switched to it. Make sure to update!
